name: uptime-watcher
description: An Electron app to monitor website uptime status
author: Nick2bad4u <20943337+Nick2bad4u@users.noreply.github.com> (https://nick2bad4u.github.io/Uptime-Watcher/)

scripts.build:electron-vite: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 tsc --build tsconfig.json && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 vite build --config ./vite.config.ts
scripts.build:playwright-coverage: npm run build:playwright-coverage:vite && npm run copy-wasm
scripts.build:prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.check:all: npm run check-types:all && echo "TypeScript type checking done!"
scripts.check:all:all: npx npm-run-all --continue-on-error --print-name --sequential build:src check:shared check:electron check:frontend check:electron:test check:frontend:test check:benchmarks:test check:shared:test check:configs:test check:playwright check:storybook && echo "TypeScript type checking done!"
scripts.check:all:test: npm run check:shared:test && npm run check:electron:test && npm run check:frontend:test && npm run check:benchmarks:test && npm run check:configs:test && npm run check:playwright && echo "TypeScript type checking done!"
scripts.check:configs: npm run verify:storybook-tsconfig && tsc --build config/testing/tsconfig.configs.json && tsc --project config/linting/plugins/uptime-watcher/tsconfig.eslint.json --noEmit
scripts.check-types: tsc --build && npm run check:shared && npm run check:electron && npm run check:frontend && npm run check:storybook
scripts.check-types:all: npm run build:src && npm run check:shared && npm run check:electron && npm run check:frontend && npm run check:electron:test && npm run check:frontend:test && npm run check:benchmarks:test && npm run check:shared:test && npm run check:configs:test && npm run check:playwright && npm run check:storybook
scripts.dev:with-sqlite3: npm run dev:sqlite3 && npm run dev
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && yarn build
scripts.docs:deploy: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && yarn deploy
scripts.docs:download:all: npm run docs:download:axios && npm run docs:download:react && npm run docs:download:chartjs && npm run docs:download:zustand && npm run docs:download:electron && npm run docs:download:validator && npm run docs:download:zod && npm run docs:download:sqlite3 && npm run docs:download:sqlite3-wasm && npm run docs:download:nodeping && npm run docs:download:tsdoc
scripts.docusaurus:broken-links: npm run docs:typedoc && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus check
scripts.docusaurus:broken-links:local: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus check
scripts.docusaurus:build: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus build
scripts.docusaurus:build:local: npm run docs:typedoc:local && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus build
scripts.docusaurus:clean: npm run docs:typedoc && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus clear
scripts.docusaurus:clean:local: npm run docs:typedoc:local && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus clear
scripts.docusaurus:serve: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus serve
scripts.docusaurus:serve:local: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus serve
scripts.docusaurus:sitemap: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus sitemap
scripts.docusaurus:sitemap:local: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus sitemap
scripts.docusaurus:start: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus start
scripts.docusaurus:start:local: npm run docs:typedoc && npm run build:eslint-inspector && cd docs/docusaurus && npx docusaurus start
scripts.format: npm run lint:prettier-fix && npm run lint:css-fix && npm run lint:fix && npm run remark:fix
scripts.format:check: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:check && npm run remark:check
scripts.fuzz:all: npm run fuzz && npm run fuzz:electron && npm run fuzz:shared
scripts.git:branch-cleanup: git branch --merged | grep -v "\*\|main\|master\|develop" | xargs -n 1 git branch -d
scripts.git:recover: echo "Recent commits in reflog:" && git reflog --oneline -10 && echo "\nTo recover to a specific commit, use: npm run git:safe-reset <commit-hash>"
scripts.git:safe-reset: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'WARNING: This will reset to the specified commit!' -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host 'Current HEAD:' -NoNewline; git log --oneline -1; Write-Host 'Use: npm run git:safe-reset-to <commit-hash> to proceed'"
scripts.git:safe-reset-to: powershell -Command "param($commit) if (-not $commit) { Write-Host 'Usage: npm run git:safe-reset-to <commit-hash>' -ForegroundColor Red; exit 1 } Write-Host 'WARNING: Resetting to commit:' $commit -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host 'Current HEAD:' -NoNewline; git log --oneline -1; $confirm = Read-Host 'Type YES to confirm'; if ($confirm -eq 'YES') { git reset --hard $commit } else { Write-Host 'Reset cancelled' -ForegroundColor Yellow }"
scripts.git:stash-all: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss'; git stash push -u -m \"Emergency stash: $timestamp\""
scripts.git:undo-reset: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Recent reflog entries:' -ForegroundColor Yellow; git reflog --oneline -5; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'To undo reset, find the commit before reset and run:' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'git reset --hard HEAD@{n}' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host 'OR use: npm run git:safe-reset-to HEAD@{n}' -ForegroundColor Cyan"
scripts.knip: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx knip -c config/tools/knip.config.ts --include-libs --cache --cache-location .cache/knip --tsConfig tsconfig.json
scripts.lint: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache && echo "Eslint done!"
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run type-check:all && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:remark && npm run lint:package && npm run lint:yaml && npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:circular && npm run knip && npm run lint:ipc && npm run lint:architecture && echo "Lint:All done!"
scripts.lint:all:all: npx npm-run-all --continue-on-error --print-name --print-label --parallel --aggregate-output lint type-check:all lint:css lint:circular knip lint:remark lint:package lint:yaml lint:prettier lint:ipc lint:architecture && echo "Lint:All done!"
scripts.lint:all:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run type-check:all && npm run lint:css:fix && npm run lint:remark:fix && npm run lint:package && npm run lint:yaml:fix && npm run lint:prettier:fix && npm run lint:circular && npm run knip && npm run lint:ipc:fix && npm run lint:architecture && echo "Lint:All:Fix done!"
scripts.lint:all:fix:all:parallel: npx npm-run-all --continue-on-error --print-name --print-label --parallel --aggregate-output lint:fix type-check:all lint:css:fix lint:circular knip lint:remark:fix lint:package lint:yaml:fix lint:prettier:fix lint:architecture
scripts.lint:all:fix:sequential: npx npm-run-all --continue-on-error --print-name --print-label --sequential lint:fix type-check:all lint:css:fix lint:circular knip lint:remark:fix lint:package lint:yaml:fix lint:prettier:fix lint:ipc:fix lint:architecture && echo "Lint:All:Fix done!"
scripts.lint:all:sequential: npx npm-run-all --continue-on-error --print-name --print-label --sequential lint type-check:all lint:css lint:circular knip lint:remark lint:package lint:yaml lint:prettier lint:ipc lint:architecture && echo "Lint:All done!"
scripts.lint:ci: npm run lint:all && npm run lint:strict && npm run docs:check-links
scripts.lint:circular: npm run madge:circular && echo "Circular Lint Madge done!"
scripts.lint:circular:shared: madge --circular --ts-config tsconfig.shared.json --extensions ts,tsx,js,jsx,mjs,cjs,cts,mts src/ electron/ shared/ --exclude "(^|[\/])(test|dist|node_modules)($|[\/])"
scripts.lint:css: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --custom-formatter stylelint-formatter-pretty && echo "Stylelint done!"
scripts.lint:css:docs: stylelint --cache --config ./docs/docusaurus/stylelint.config.mjs --ignore-path ./docs/docusaurus/.stylelintignore --cache-strategy content --cache-location docs/docusaurus/stylelintcache docs/docusaurus --custom-formatter stylelint-formatter-pretty && echo "Stylelint done!"
scripts.lint:css:docs:fix: stylelint --cache --config ./docs/docusaurus/stylelint.config.mjs --ignore-path ./docs/docusaurus/.stylelintignore --cache-strategy content --cache-location docs/docusaurus/stylelintcache docs/docusaurus --custom-formatter stylelint-formatter-pretty --fix && echo "Stylelint done!"
scripts.lint:css:fix: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --custom-formatter stylelint-formatter-pretty --fix && echo "Stylelint done!"
scripts.lint:css:verbose: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --formatter verbose && echo "Stylelint done!"
scripts.lint:current: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache . && echo "Stylelint done!"
scripts.lint:electron: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache electron/ && echo "Eslint electron done!"
scripts.lint:fix: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache --fix && echo "Eslint fix done!"
scripts.lint:format: npm run lint:prettier && echo "Prettier check done!"
scripts.lint:format:fix: npm run lint:format && echo "Prettier fix done!"
scripts.lint:html:format: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache --format html -o ESLintReport.html
scripts.lint:ipc:fix: npm run generate:ipc && npm run check:ipc
scripts.lint:madge:electron: madge --circular --ts-config tsconfig.electron.json --extensions ts,tsx,js,jsx,mjs,cjs,cts,mts src/ electron/ shared/ --exclude "(^|[\/])(test|dist|node_modules)($|[\/])"
scripts.lint:no-tests: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache src/ electron/ shared/ --ignore-pattern "**/test/**" --ignore-pattern "**/tests/**" --ignore-pattern "**/*.test.*" --ignore-pattern "**/*.spec.*" && echo "Eslint (no tests) done!"
scripts.lint:package: npm run lint:package-sort && npm run lint:packagelintrc && echo "Package.json lint done!"
scripts.lint:package:strict: npm run lint:package-sort && npm run lint:package-check && npm run lint:packagelintrc && echo "Package.json lint done!"
scripts.lint:quick: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:remark:fix: prettier --log-level warn --ignore-path config/tools/prettierignore.remark --cache --cache-location=.cache/.prettier-cache --cache-strategy=content --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --write "*.{md,mdx}" "docs/**/*.{md,mdx}" "src/**/*.{md,mdx}" "electron/**/*.{md,mdx}" "shared/**/*.{md,mdx}" && npm run remark:fix
scripts.lint:security: npm run lint:security:resolve-audit && npm run lint:security:sensitive
scripts.lint:shared: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache shared/ && echo "Eslint shared done!"
scripts.lint:src: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache src/ && echo "Eslint src done!"
scripts.lint:stylelint: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --formatter verbose
scripts.lint:stylelint:actions: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --custom-formatter stylelint-actions-formatters
scripts.lint:stylelint:checkstyle: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --custom-formatter stylelint-checkstyle-formatter
scripts.lint:stylelint:codeframe: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --custom-formatter stylelint-codeframe-formatter
scripts.lint:stylelint:fix: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --formatter verbose --fix
scripts.lint:stylelint:github: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --custom-formatter @csstools/stylelint-formatter-github
scripts.lint:stylelint:gitlab: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --custom-formatter stylelint-formatter-gitlab-code-quality-report
scripts.lint:stylelint:pretty: stylelint --cache --config stylelint.config.mjs --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/stylelintcache src/ electron/ shared/ docs/ --custom-formatter stylelint-formatter-pretty
scripts.lint:yaml: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache "**/*.{yml,yaml}" && echo "YAML lint done!"
scripts.lint:yaml:fix: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 eslint --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache --fix "**/*.{yml,yaml}" && echo "YAML lint (fix) done!"
scripts.lint-pretty: npm run lint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint-pretty:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run lint:prettynow
scripts.lpf: npm run lint:fix && npm run lint:prettynow
scripts.madge:circular: madge --circular --no-spinner --ts-config tsconfig.json --extensions ts,tsx,js,jsx,mjs,cjs,cts,mts src/ electron/ shared/ --exclude "(^|[\/])(test|dist|node_modules)($|[\/])|\.css$"
scripts.madge:leaves: madge --leaves --no-spinner --ts-config tsconfig.json --extensions ts,tsx,js,jsx,mjs,cjs,cts,mts src/ electron/ shared/ --exclude "(^|[\/])(test|dist|node_modules)($|[\/])|\.css$"
scripts.madge:orphans: madge --orphans --no-spinner --ts-config tsconfig.json --extensions ts,tsx,js,jsx,mjs,cjs,cts,mts src/ electron/ shared/ --exclude "(^|[\/])(test|dist|node_modules)($|[\/])|\.css$"
scripts.prebuild:off: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.quality: npm run lint:all && npm run test:all:coverage
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint:ci && npm run test:all:coverage
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postreset: npm run reset && npm run postbuild
scripts.sqlite:reinstall-wasm: npm run sqlite:clean-wasm && npm run sqlite:download
scripts.start:clean: npm run clean && npm run electron-dev
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start:electron
scripts.start:reset: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run electron-dev
scripts.storybook:test: cross-env VITEST=true VITEST_STORYBOOK=true NODE_ENV=test storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:test:coverage: cross-env VITEST=true VITEST_STORYBOOK=true NODE_ENV=test VITE_COVERAGE=true storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:storybook && npm run test:playwright
scripts.test:all:coverage: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:electron:coverage && npm run test:shared:coverage && npm run test:storybook:coverage && npm run test:playwright:coverage
scripts.test:all:detailed: npm run test:detailed && npm run test:electron:detailed && npm run test:shared:detailed && npm run test:storybook:detailed && npm run test:playwright
scripts.test:all:minimal: npm run test:minimal && npm run test:electron:minimal && npm run test:shared:minimal && npm run test:storybook:minimal && npm run test:playwright
scripts.test:all:quiet: npm run test:quiet && npm run test:electron:quiet && npm run test:shared:quiet && npm run test:storybook:quiet && npm run test:playwright
scripts.test:all:verbose: npm run test:verbose && npm run test:electron:verbose && npm run test:shared:verbose && npm run test:storybook:verbose && npm run test:playwright
scripts.test:coverage:open: npm run test:coverage && npm run open:coverage
scripts.test:playwright:coverage: rimraf coverage/playwright && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_COVERAGE=true npx playwright test && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_COVERAGE=true tsx scripts/report-playwright-coverage.ts
scripts.test:storybook: cross-env VITEST=true NODE_ENV=test node --max-old-space-size=16384 ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run --config vitest.storybook.config.ts --silent
scripts.test:storybook:coverage: cross-env VITEST=true NODE_ENV=test node --max-old-space-size=16384 ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run --config vitest.storybook.config.ts --coverage
scripts.test:storybook:detailed: cross-env VITEST=true NODE_ENV=test node --max-old-space-size=16384 ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run --config vitest.storybook.config.ts --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:storybook:minimal: cross-env VITEST=true NODE_ENV=test node --max-old-space-size=16384 ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run --config vitest.storybook.config.ts --reporter=dot
scripts.test:storybook:quiet: cross-env VITEST=true NODE_ENV=test node --max-old-space-size=16384 ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run --config vitest.storybook.config.ts --reporter=default --silent
scripts.test:storybook:verbose: cross-env VITEST=true NODE_ENV=test node --max-old-space-size=16384 ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run --config vitest.storybook.config.ts --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:storybook:watch: cross-env VITEST=true NODE_ENV=test node --max-old-space-size=16384 ./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs run --config vitest.storybook.config.ts --watch
scripts.updateDeps: npx ncu -i --install never && npx ncu -i --install never --packageFile docs/docusaurus/package.json && npm install --force && cd docs/docusaurus && npm install --force

linux.synopsis: A cross-platform Electron app to monitor website uptime status
